modName: Konahrik HQ Dragonpriest helm overhaul by Remcees
summary: This mod replaces the original Konahrik texture with a HQ better looking one!
descriptionHtml:
Check out my other mask retexture, but beware I have only done so much texturing, so there might be a difference between this one and the old one.

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5934

AS FOR THIS MOD.

It replaces the standard texture, which was kind of simple for such a possesive item, with a 1024x1024 texture. With that I gave it a whole overhaul.

To install; Place this in your skyrim folder ewhich will probably be something like this:

C:\\ProgramFiles\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim or something


I have been asked before, so I will announce: This is my last dragonpriest overhaul for now. Do not expect any new ones in the near future!
author: Remcees
